post.body: btw... Case of Benjamin Button... I give it 3 out of 5 stars. Neither it or 7 lbs deserves to be on best or worst list.
heading to bed...can hardly wait for the Well's new year to begin in the am
hanging out at Bobs watching Battlestar Galactica
watchin' b s g with Bob
heading to see Benjamin Button...will tell ya if it belongs on the worst or best list later...
Relishing in the fact that I finally spent a day doing nothing of "significance"...which, is in fact, pretty significant. Nice to exhale!!!
Merry Christmas to all and to all a good night!
Willow Cmas program a no go tonight due to untimely winter weather...heading to Oswego for fall-back joint-Bday dinner for Jess & Lauren
minus 30 degrees below 0 Windchill and still God blessed us with 113 at the Well ..."only God"!
Excitement/Anxiety over the Well's first Cmas Service... watching "The Nativity Story" to remind me what my focus should be on tomorrow.
just finished watching a good movie "The Visitor"...
enjoying quite night at home after Jess' successful surgery today. Thanks for your encouragement and prayers
"Enormous" tonsils & adnoids succesfully removed!
Waiting to hear from Dr
gettin ready for bed and praying that Jess's 7:30 am removal of tonsils and adnoids goes smoothly and w/o pain- pray with me to that end.
Lovin the snow!!!!!!!
Hearing from Bob how the yuutes trip went in Chicago yesterday.
Watching Home Alone--- still cracks me up when he puts on the after shave.
Home after a low key day of catching up on emails, preparing for weekend retreat, initial work on message and some hang out time with Bob :)
Now headed to pick up things for the Well and the wife w/ all 4 girls while Chris finishes Christmas @ the house.
